**Government Tender Announcement:** 
**W7701-237705 Professional Services to Support Electro-Optical Systems Characterization**
==============================================

**Tender Details:**
---------------

* **Reference Number:** WS4298649699-DOC4349359136
* **Publication Date:** December 12, 2023
* **Closing Date:** January 23, 2024, 14:00 EST
* **Contract Period:** April 1, 2024 to be advised

**Service Requirements:**
-------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) for the provision of professional services in support of electro-optical systems characterization. The successful bidder will be required to provide services in support of the characterization of electro-optical systems covering spectral bands from ultraviolet to infrared, including image intensification systems.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
------------------

 The bid will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. Proposals will be assessed based on the ability of the bidder to meet the requirements outlined in Annex A of the RFP.

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

 For more information, please contact Pierre-Alexandre Simard at:

pierre-alexandre.simard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**
------------

The complete RFP document can be accessed at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18248520?extsite=MTgyNDg1MjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
